on Unreported Tip Income

must

smaller

13
Add lines 11 and 12. Enter the result here and on Form 1040, line 57; Form 1040NR, line 55; or 
Form 1040NR-EZ, line 16 (Form 1040-SS and 1040-PR filers, see instructions.)
